help.short: The name of the bare metal machine.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="associatedResourceIds">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="interfaces" identifiers="name">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="nics" identifiers="name">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="hybridAksClustersAssociatedIds">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="machineRoles">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="virtualMachinesAssociatedIds">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the bare metal machine.
The name of the bare metal machine.
The extended location of the cluster associated with the resource.
The resource ID of the extended location on which the resource will be created.
The extended location type, for example, CustomLocation.
The geo-location where the resource lives
Resource tags.
The connection string for the baseboard management controller including IP address and protocol.
The credentials of the baseboard management controller on this bare metal machine.
The password of the administrator of the device used during initialization.
The username of the administrator of the device used during initialization.
The MAC address of the BMC device.
The MAC address of a NIC connected to the PXE network.
The custom details provided by the customer.
The OS-level hostname assigned to this machine.
The unique internal identifier of the bare metal machine SKU.
The resource ID of the rack where this bare metal machine resides.
The rack slot in which this bare metal machine is located, ordered from the bottom up i.e. the lowest slot is 1.
The serial number of the bare metal machine.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="associatedResourceIds">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="interfaces" identifiers="name">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="nics" identifiers="name">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="hybridAksClustersAssociatedIds">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="machineRoles">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="virtualMachinesAssociatedIds">

help.short: The name of the bare metal machine.
The Azure resource tags that will replace the existing ones.
The details provided by the customer during the creation of rack manifests that allows for custom data to be associated with this machine.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="associatedResourceIds">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="interfaces" identifiers="name">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="nics" identifiers="name">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="hybridAksClustersAssociatedIds">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="machineRoles">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="virtualMachinesAssociatedIds">
